metadata.title: CVE-2018-4345 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A cross-site scripting issue existed in Safari. This issue was addressedwith improved URL validation. This issue affected versions prior to iOS 12,tvOS 12, Safari 12, iTunes 12.9 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 7.7.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4345` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.3-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.3-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.3-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.22.3-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.22.3-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
